Aap andar se kuch aur', '
Bahar se kuch aur nazar aate hain', '
Bakhuda shakal se to chor nazar aate hain', '
Umar guzari hai saari chori mein', '

Dil yeh kehta hai aap', '

Ki pag ghungroo baandh meera naachi thi', '
